title: [GAMEPLAY] Darius Q applies damage while Vladimir is in pool.

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
When Vladimir uses sanguine pool while Darius uses decimate, the damage from decimate still applies to Vladimir even though he is in pool form. 

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Use Sanguine Pool while Darius uses Q
2. Damage still applies to Vlad

replies.body:
Are you sure it's not just the health cost of sanguine pool?

Edit: sanguine pool consumes 20% of current HP to cast.
the health cost wouldn't be that much
It's 20% of your current health. At full health, it definitely would be that much.
